title: Madrigal's NASH prospect clears first phase 3 test, raising hopes it can magic up positive pivotal efficacy data
author: Nick Paul Taylor
description: Madrigal Pharmaceuticals has passed the first of two phase 3 | Madrigal Pharmaceuticals has passed the first of two phase 3 nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH) trials. With the study finding the ex-Roche drug reduces liver fat, Madrigal is heading to a more comprehensive efficacy readout with increased confidence in its chances of bucking the industry's NASH losing streak.
